entry.title: No gay, but Cat is - V-Neckt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

This unisex jersey short sleeve V-neck tee radiates a casual yet stylish vibe, perfect for expressing individuality and embracing inclusivity. Its vibrant design complements a wide array of outfits, making it ideal for everyone from trendsetters to casual wear enthusiasts. Perfect for events such as Pride celebrations, LGBTQ+ gatherings, or simply to showcase your personality, this tee adds a playful and bold touch to any wardrobe. It's a great gift for friends, family, or anyone who loves to make a statement with their fashion choices during holidays like Pride Month and any celebration of love and acceptance.

Product features
- Made with side seams for improved shape retention and structural support.
- Features a ribbed knit collar that enhances elasticity and shape retention.
- Includes shoulder tape for added stabilization and durability.
- Crafted from lightweight, breathable 100% cotton fabric for year-round comfort.
- Produced sustainably by Bella+Canvas, ensuring humane labor practices.

Care instructions
- Do not dryclean
- Machine wash: warm (max 40C or 105F)
- Non-chlorine: bleach as needed
- Tumble dry: low heat
- Iron, steam or dry: medium heat

entry.title: I’m not GAY, but my MOM is
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

This classic unisex jersey short sleeve tee fits like a well-loved favorite. Soft cotton and quality print make users fall in love with it over and over again. These t-shirts have-ribbed knit collars to bolster shaping. The shoulders are tapered for a better fit over time. Dual side seams hold the garment's shape for longer.

.: Made with 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, a lightweight fabric (4.2 oz/yd² (142 g/m²)) that is easy to layer, breathable. Perfect for active and leisure wear.
.: The retail fit that is perfect for casual and semi-formal settings. The crew neckline adds a classic, neat style that's perfect for accessorizing.
.: Bella+Canvas manufactures all its products in the US and internationally in humane, no-sweat-shop, sustainable way and is part of the Fair Labor Association as well as Platinum WRAP certified.
.: The tear-away label minimizes skin irritations.
.: Fabric blends: Ash - 99% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 1% polyester; Heather colors - 52% cotton, 48% polyester; Athletic Heather and Black Heather - 90% cotton, 10% polyester.

entry.title: I’m not GAY, but D❤️D is -
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

 

I’m not GAY, but D❤️D is

 

“We have many more shirts for you to tell your personal story’s with. “I hadn’t talked to my mom in person in a long time. 

When I went to my sisters wedding, I met my mom’s new friend.

It seemed a little odd, but I did not bring it up.  

I drove to my mom’s house, and there was a large gay flag at the front door. 

That said it all.

My mom thought that I would be angry, but I gave her a big hug instead. 

I’m not gay, but my mom is.”

-MRM

 

We have many more shirts for you to tell  your personal story’s with.

 

 

  S M L XL 2XL 3XL
